title: GLAM-Workbench/trove-images
description:
Current version: v1.0.1

Jupyter notebooks to work with data from Trove’s picture zone. For more information see the Trove images section of the GLAM Workbench.

Notebook topics

  • The use of standard licences and rights statements in Trove image records – build a picture of which rights statements are currently being used, and by who.

Datasets

Harvested 9 March 2022

  • Rights applied to images by each Trove contributor
  • Rights applied to out-of-copyright photographs by each Trove contributor

Cite as

See the GLAM Workbench for up-to-date citation details.

This repository is part of the GLAM Workbench.
